languages.text: "Мы можем заминировать остатки корабля и подорвать его вместе с артефактом, когда отлетим на достаточное расстояние. У меня есть ресурсы и знания, чтобы сделать это".

traits.locale_text: "Мы можем заминировать остатки корабля и подорвать его вместе с артефактом, когда отлетим на достаточное расстояние. У меня есть ресурсы и знания, чтобы сделать это".

languages.text: "We could lay mines in what remains of the ship and blast it along with the artefact from a safe distance. I have the resources and the knowledge to do it."
languages.original_text: "Мы можем заминировать остатки корабля и подорвать его вместе с артефактом, когда отлетим на достаточное расстояние. У меня есть ресурсы и знания, чтобы сделать это".

traits.locale_text: "We could mine what remains of the ship and blast it along with the artifact from a safe distance. I have the resources and the knowledge to do it."
"We could mine what remains of the ship and blast it along with the artifact from a safe distance. I have the resources and the knowledge to do it."
"We could lay mines in what remains of the ship and blast it along with the artifact from a safe distance. I have the resources and the knowledge to do it."
"We could lay mines in what remains of the ship and blast it along with the artifact from a safe distance. I have the resources and the knowledge to do it."
"We could lay mines in what remains of the ship and blast it along with the artefact from a safe distance. I have the resources and the knowledge to do it."

languages.text: 「船の残骸に地雷を設置し、安全な距離からアーティファクトと一緒に爆破することができる。私にはそのための資源も知識もある」
languages.original_text: "We could lay mines in what remains of the ship and blast it along with the artefact from a safe distance. I have the resources and the knowledge to do it."

traits.locale_text: 「船の残骸に地雷を設置し、安全な距離から遺物と一緒に爆破することができる。私にはそのための資源も知識もある」

languages.text: “我们可以在这艘船残存的区域埋设地雷，之后躲在安全距离外，将飞船与那件造物一起炸毁。我有足够的资源和技术手段做这件事情。”
languages.original_text: "We could lay mines in what remains of the ship and blast it along with the artefact from a safe distance. I have the resources and the knowledge to do it."

traits.locale_text: “我们可以在这艘船残存的区域埋设地雷，之后躲在安全距离外，将飞船与那件造物一起炸毁。我有足够的资源和技术手段做这件事情。”

languages.text: «Podríamos minar los restos de la nave y detonarlo todo junto con el artefacto desde una distancia segura. Tengo los recursos y los conocimientos necesarios para ello».
languages.original_text: "We could lay mines in what remains of the ship and blast it along with the artefact from a safe distance. I have the resources and the knowledge to do it."

traits.locale_text: «Podríamos minar los restos de la nave y detonarlo todo junto con el artefacto desde una distancia segura. Tengo los recursos y los conocimientos necesarios para ello».

languages.text: « Nous pourrions poser des explosifs dans ce qu'il reste du vaisseau et le faire sauter avec l'artefact une fois à bonne distance. J'ai toutes les ressources et les connaissances qu'il faut. »
languages.original_text: "We could lay mines in what remains of the ship and blast it along with the artefact from a safe distance. I have the resources and the knowledge to do it."

traits.locale_text: « Nous pourrions poser des explosifs dans ce qu'il reste du vaisseau et le faire sauter avec l'artefact une fois à bonne distance. J'ai toutes les ressources et les connaissances qu'il faut. »

languages.text: "Wir könnten Minen in den Überresten des Schiffs legen und alles zusammen mit dem Artefakt aus sicherer Entfernung sprengen. Ich habe die Ressourcen und das nötige Wissen dafür."
languages.original_text: "We could lay mines in what remains of the ship and blast it along with the artefact from a safe distance. I have the resources and the knowledge to do it."

traits.locale_text: "Wir könnten Minen in den Überresten des Schiffs legen und alles zusammen mit dem Artefakt aus sicherer Entfernung sprengen. Ich habe die Ressourcen und das nötige Wissen dafür."

languages.text: "Geminin kalıntılarına mayın döşeyip eserle birlikte güvenli bir mesafeden patlatabiliriz. Bu konuda gerekli kaynağa ve bilgiye sahibim."
languages.original_text: "We could lay mines in what remains of the ship and blast it along with the artefact from a safe distance. I have the resources and the knowledge to do it."

traits.locale_text: "Geminin kalıntılarına mayın döşeyip eserle birlikte güvenli bir mesafeden patlatabiliriz. Bu konuda gerekli kaynağa ve bilgiye sahibim."
